snippet.title: Magic: Legends - Open Beta Announcement Trailer | Epic Games Store Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
Prepare to Ignite Your Spark - Magic: Legends Open Beta arrives on the Epic Games Store for free on March 23! Take on the role of a powerful, spell-slinging Planeswalker, strategically build a deck from over 170 spells, and control the chaos of combat across 3 planes of the Magic Multiverse. For the first two weeks of Open Beta, Epic users who login will get a free character costume, creature skin, and two boosts! https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/magic-legends/home


#EpicGamesStoreSpringShowcase #EpicSpringShowcase #EGSSpringShowcase
